name: Star Rider (TeamStarRider)
description:
Feedback: https://forms.gle/BB19PDZXsEDNFyUW6

Follow us on Twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/TeamStarRider1   

A 3D action shooter allows you to control the 'Sirius' a spaceship used to destroy the enemies in the game. fly around and defeat enemies to clear the map.  Our current goal is to test out core gameplay so watch for our bi-monthly build updates.

Controls:

KeyboardControllerAimMouseRight Control StickMovementWASD  /  Arrows Left Control StickFire Left ClickRight Trigger / ASkill Right Click Left Trigger / X

You can download the latest build below and leave us some feedback.
